burlap.mdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate

Interface BeliefUpdate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TabularBeliefUpdate

    public interface BeliefUpdate
    An interface for defining methods that can compute an updated belief state given a prior belief state, a new observation, and the action that led to that observation.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeliefState update(BeliefState belief, State observation, Action a)
      Computes a new belief distribution from a previous belief and given a new observation received after taking a specific action.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        BeliefState update(BeliefState belief,
                   State observation,
                   Action a)
        Computes a new belief distribution from a previous belief and given a new observation received after taking a specific action.
        Parameters:
        belief - the prior belief
        observation - the conditioned POMDP observation defined by a State instance.
        a - the conditioned action selection in the previous time step.
        Returns:
        the new belief state distribution represented by a new BeliefState instance.
